comment.text: Absolutely crucial insights here. In our immersion programs, we consistently see that sustainable wellbeing strategies require more than policies - they need cultural transformation. The most effective organizations we work with recognize that employee wellbeing and AI readiness are deeply interconnected. When people feel genuinely supported and psychologically safe, they're far more open to embracing change and new technologies. It's about creating environments where human potential can flourish alongside technological advancement. üå±
